title: Grant Shapps – 2022 Comments on Rail Ticket Pricing
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Grant Shapps, the Secretary of State for Transport, on 19 April 2022.
content:
For the first time ever, operators across the rail industry are coming together to help passengers facing rising costs of living by offering up to 50% off more than a million tickets on journeys across Britain.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

There’s no better time to visit friends, family or just explore our great country, so book your tickets today.
